mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_VIEWS, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_REGDT,'mm-dd') as BOARD_REGDT , M.MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ

SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_VIEWS, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_REGDT,'yy-mm-dd') as BOARD_REGDT, B.BOARD_CONTENT, M.MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE B.BOARD_SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL as BOARD_SEQ FROM BOARD
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES(#{boardSeq},1,#{boardTitle},#{boardContent})
